All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Configuration
This class handles the configuration of the ticketing system.
Customer
A thread that removes tickets from the pool at a specific rate.
FileHandler
A utility class that handles loading and saving configuration data to and from a file in JSON format.
JavaFxInterface
This class represents the user interface of the Real-Time Ticketing System.
TableLogger
A logger class that handles logging messages with timestamps to a ListView.
TicketingSystem
The main class that manages the ticketing system.
TicketPool
A class representing a pool of tickets for an event.
Vendor
A thread that adds tickets to the pool at a specific rate.
